attributes.action: defer the current MP’s pay review so that any percentage over and above the current rate of inflation only comes into effect immediately after the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the decision not to backdate the police pay rise, MPs are about to vote on their own pay increase that is above the rate of inflation. The excuse constantly employed by MPs to justify their pay increases is that they must have a salary attractive to people of all means, not just the very rich, to ensure that a broad cross section of society seek election. As nobody can seek to fill the position - by-elections notwithstanding - until after the Prime Minister calls a general election, then there is no call to raise the incentive until this time.
